content: Create separate data file for Sales & Marketing Wissen articles (wissen-data.ts)
Move the 20 Q&A articles from blog-data.ts to wissen-data.ts
Create new route /wissen with page.tsx and content component
Update header navigation to show both 'Blog' and 'Sales & Marketing Wissen'
Restore original blog metadata in metadata.json
Add new metadata for /wissen route in metadata.json
Update blog-page-content.tsx to show original blog heading
Verify both routes work correctly and display the right content
